abstract.text: Apple no longer supports this API.

doc://com.apple.applesearchads/documenta.title: Apple Search Ads Campaign Management API 2

abstract.text: Drive app discovery by creating and managing campaigns with the Apple Search Ads Campaign Management API.
The channel type of an ad in a campaign.
The response to a request to create and fetch campaigns.
Reasons why a campaign can’t run.
The app data to fetch from campaign-level reports.
Reasons the system provides when a campaign can’t run.
The status of the campaign.
The list of condition objects that allow users to filter a list of records.
The descriptions of metrics with dates.
Fetches reports for campaigns.
The summary of cumulative metrics.
The container object for bid recommendations.
The object that contains bid recommendations.
The response to requests for budget amounts in campaigns.
The response to a request to fetch ad-level reports.

The response to a request to fetch campaign-level reports.

The report request body.
The container object of report metrics.
The container object for the report response body.

The reporting response metrics.
